text: Well hello, and welcome back to the channel.
It is certainly been a while.

Sam and I have been traveling in Argentina
for the last 3 months but we are now back

in Canada back in the studio getting back
into editing.

And today we have a special video for you
because we have teamed up with Trover to give

one of you guys a $1000 dollar travel prize
so you can go on your own foodie adventure.

So if you know us you already know we love
food.
We love to travel.

And now we're going to tell you why you need
to know about Trover.

Trover is a travel and photography app designed
to help you share and discover new places.

You can use the app on your phone, tablet
or desktop computer to upload images of things

like a great local restaurant, a quirky landmark,
or a fun tour you went on.

You can then geo-tag these discoveries and
write a caption with any insider tips you

may have, so that other travellers can in
turn find these places and share the same
experiences.

Since you already know I’m a major foodie,
one of the ways I like to use Trover is to
share food discoveries around the world.

For example, Sam and I just spent 3 months
in Argentina where we: feasted on Knackwurst

and Sauerkraut in this small alpine town that
was founded by Germans…

We also had a spectacular Welsh tea in the
very same place Lady Diana once visited…

And, once we got to Mendoza we spent a full-day
touring a bodega, sampling their wines, and
then enjoying a steak lunch at their restaurant.

These are just a few of the discoveries you
can find on my Trover page.

Trover also has a ‘nearby’ function where
you can explore places near you, and then

sort these by food, outdoors, or art, based
on your interest.

So if you’re traveling somewhere and you’re
not quite sure what to do, you can open the
app and see what’s near you.

But now let’s talk about how 1 of you can
win a $1000 travel prize in partnership with
Trover.
So back to the giveaway.

Basically, all you have to do is upload a
photo of your favorite foodie spot.

So that could be a bar, a cafe, a restaurant,
a food market, a food truck.
You name it.
It just has to be food related.
So upload your image, write a little description.

Be sure to include the #TroverFoodies hashtag
so we can track your submission.

We'll be accepting submissions from May 1st
to May 15th.

Then we'll be choosing a winner and getting
in touch with you the lucky one to give you

your $1000 travel prize that you can use to
go on your own foodie adventure.

So we look forward to seeing your submissions
and we'll see you guys in the next video.
Bye!
